participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: outgoing and adventurous, loves trying new things and meeting new people.
participant_1.background: I grew up on a farm in Kansas. I love to go horseback riding. My wife and I like to go scuba diving. I have three daughters.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: thoughtful and introspective, enjoys quiet moments but values friendships.
participant_2.background: I was diagnosed with mild OCD in college. Once a year, I take a week off and head to Florida. I freeze up in social situations. Sometimes I feel like I've already been through life once before. I work as a freelance accountant.

content.text: Where are you from?
I grew up in Kansas, but I live in California now.
What do you do for work?
I'm a freelance accountant.
Oh, that's cool! I've always been interested in accounting, but I'm not very good at it.
It's not as hard as it seems! You just have to be organized and have a good understanding of numbers.
I think I might have to take a class or two to learn more about it.
That's a good idea! It can be really helpful.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the beach, I like to go scuba diving, and I like to go horseback riding.
Oh, that sounds fun! I've never gone scuba diving before, but I've always wanted to try it.
It's really fun! You get to see all kinds of amazing fish and coral reefs.
That sounds amazing! I'll have to try it sometime.
You should! It's a great experience.
So, what do you do for fun in California?
I go to the beach a lot, I like to go hiking, and I like to go kayaking.
Oh, that sounds like a lot of fun! I'd love to go hiking and kayaking with you sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to show you around California.
Okay! I'm free this weekend, if you want to go hiking.
This weekend is actually my busy weekend, but I'm free next weekend.
Okay! Next weekend sounds great.
Okay! I'll text you with the details.
